response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 to us, reflecting its quality and the effort put into its creation. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or serve as an excellent tool for your needs. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we kindly propose a price of $7,500 for this remarkable product. We hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 7500}
